definitions: apply quantum theory to, especially form into quanta, in particular restrict the number of possible values of (a quantity) or states of (a system) so that certain variables can assume only certain discrete magnitudes

examples.text: light is quantized into packets of energy

definitions: approximate (a continuously varying signal) by one whose amplitude is restricted to a prescribed set of values

examples.text: distortion is caused when very low-level audio signals are quantized

shortDefinitions: approximate continuously varying signal by one whose amplitude is restricted to prescribed set of values
